item.title: Tents and men in bushes, 15th September
item.description:
As I walk around these woods, I am seeing more and more tents popping up in bushes. Men just appearing from bushes and acting suspiciously and following or just staring. I am a dog walker and finding this very unnerving lately Can not take pics of tents as can be seen doing so No one patrols these areas so people especially women and children are extremely vulnerable
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elstree Gardens, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not emptied YET AGAIN, 15th September
item.description:
It seems I have to report this every single week that cardboard communal bins along frobisher road have not been emptied in weeks, resulting in me having to take my cardboard to the recycling center, YET AGAIN. Why am I paying council tax?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frobisher Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large broken branch potentially threatening pedestrians, 15th September
item.description:

item.title: Building buttons intercom broken - Lordship Road Flat 87 to 125, 15th September
item.description:
The buttons have stopped working on the intercom for the last 2 days so my friend's have been unable to buzz through to my apartment. This will be affecting deliveries as well. The call button works, but none of the numbers register to call a specific flat
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lordship Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
